$NVDA all the talking heads are preaching value over growth. It’s the big rotation. But let’s think. Fed is still putting $$ into the market. The hikes are minuscule (relative to the past). The mega cap tech stocks are not just growing they are profitable & continue to innovate in ways that will improve business & life. These are not the tech stocks of the 90s & early 2000s that had no plans at all. They IPOd with cool names & has zero clue. It was insanity. Many were trying to sell vapor ware. I don’t see $NVDA $AAPL $MSFT & the like going OB. I guess the market needs to be reminded that “Another highlight of [Nvidia’s] third quarter earnings was NVIDIA's bottom line profit, which…crossed $2.4 billion for an 84% annual growth.” Mega cap tech will come roaring back & the pundits will turn around and claim they knew it all along.
